Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service Dist. No. 1 -- 13 Mills - BOC - 25 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage)
Race.FullText: Shall Franklin Parish Hospital Service District No. 1, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized under the authority conferred by Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, the applicable provisions of Chapter 5, Chapter 6-A and Chapter 6-B of Title 18 of the Louisiana Revised Statutes of 1950, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority, to levy a thirteen (13) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $1,008,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of twenty-five (25) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2038, for the purpose of constructing, improving, equipping, operating and maintaining hospital facilities within said District?
